thread.title: IN PICS! Shahrukh's AbRam Dancing In The Car, His Short Drive With Rohit Shetty!
thread.title_full: IN PICS! Shahrukh's AbRam Dancing In The Car, His Short Drive With Rohit Shetty!

title: IN PICS! Shahrukh's AbRam Dancing In The Car, His Short Drive With Rohit Shetty!
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below Don't ask Again 
Probably, this is the cutest thing which you will see today on the internet. We are going to show you more of AbRam's cute antics. On this particular video, AbRam is seen dancing in the car while his dad Sharukh is driving.On another set of pics you will see the cute kid with Dilwale director Rohit Shetty , in which the little munchkin sitting on the lap of his inside yellow two-seater car. Whereas, Shahrukh can be seen watching AbRam and his fun from a distance. 
AbRam, also said in his cute voice that, 'Papa I'm driving'. If this is not the cutest thing on the internet today, we don't know what is!Rohit-Shahrukh's Dilwale is slated to be released on December 18, 2015, which also casts Kajol , Varun Dhawan, Kriti Sanon, Vinod Khanna and others in the key roles.Check out the adorable picture of AbRam with Rohit Shetty & Shahrukh Khan here and also his dancing video! VIDEO! Shahrukh's AbRam Dancing In The Car! 1/7 
Shahrukh Khan's little munchkin, AbRam enjoying short drive with his Rohit Uncle. Isn't it sweet? 
VIDEO! Shahrukh's AbRam Dancing In The Car! 2/7 Shahrukh Watching AbRam 
Whereas, Shahrukh can be seen in white outfit, watching AbRam and his fun from a distance. 
VIDEO! Shahrukh's AbRam Dancing In The Car! 3/7 Inside Yellow Car 
In this picture, the cutie-pie AbRam is sitting on the lap of Rohit Shetty inside yellow two-seater car. 
VIDEO! Shahrukh's AbRam Dancing In The Car! 4/7 
And we're sure these pictures of AbRam are surely making yo go 'Awww'. 
VIDEO! Shahrukh's AbRam Dancing In The Car! 5/7 Watch AbRam's Dancing Video In Next Slide 
Go to next slide to watch Shahrukh's little AbRam's dancing video in the car. 
VIDEO! Shahrukh's AbRam Dancing In The Car! 6/7 Watch AbRam's Dancing Video 
Watch here the dancing video in the car, while his dad Sharukh Khan is driving. Click on this link AbRam Khan Dancing In Car, Driving By Shahrukh Khan You might like
